wiki.content: Singer/rapper/songwriter/producer Cee Lo Green scored a huge hit single with 'Forget You' in October 2010 – sales of the clean version and the slightly in your face, “N.S.F.W.” version were combined for chart purposes and the single shot to the top spot to give Cee Lo his first solo UK No.1. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Singer/rapper/songwriter/producer Cee Lo Green scored a huge hit single with 'Forget You' in October 2010 – sales of the clean version and the slightly in your face, “N.S.F.W.” version were combined for chart purposes and the single shot to the top spot to give Cee Lo his first solo UK No.1.

track.name: Forget You
comments: Don't mind the censored version. Allows me to have a good old sing-a-long in the car with the kids in the back.
I hope to god that this censored version never plays again.  It's like painting a mustache on the Mona Lisa.
NOW AIN'T THAT SOME SHHHHHHHHHH?
I'm sorry I can't afford a Ferrari you all. Forget you. 8D
i wuv you cee lo
coollllll :0
